ColourWords.Title: Present simple: he and she question forms and short answers
ColourWords.Instruction: Click on the incorrect word in each question or answer.

Content.Sentence: 1. Do Does Edward eat meat? No, he doesn’t.
2. Does Lara like likes dancing? Yes, she does.
3. Does Chris work in the city? No, he doesn’t don't.
4. Do Does Imogen live with you? Yes, she does.
5. Does Matt studies study at the university? No, he doesn’t.
6. Does Andrea use a computer at work? No, she don’t doesn’t.
7. Do Does the dog like meat? Yes, it does.
8. Does your father read a newspaper at home? Yes, he do does.
9. Does Sam watches watch a lot of TV? No, he doesn’t.
10. Do Does she like cooking? Yes, she does.
